website_summaries.verdict: Compact sleigh bed that retains the classic elements while still being space-savvy. Available in 3 popular finishes that match most décor.
pros: bed has a reasonable amount of weight to it at 72.6 pounds
Ideal for older kids and teens
could be turned into guest room furniture

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed was purchased for my 84-year-old mother. She absolutely loves it. It is easy for her to crawl in and out. We purchased a memory foam mattress to go on top and she is very pleased with how sturdy and comfortable the bed feels.
customer_reviews.author: mari

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bed. Bought it for my daughter as her first big girl bed. This bed is very sturdy, even for adults. Does not require a box spring either. The wait time was a few weeks to receive bit worth the wait as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Solid bed
customer_reviews.text: Great value for price. Solid wood bed. Easy to assemble. My 12 year old daughter loves it. This bed is solid wood, so hopefully it lasts longer than the last bed my daughter had which was made of fiber board. This bed is the same price point and is much more solid.
customer_reviews.author: Alan L

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: First online purchase of a furniture piece. I was worried it would be really cheap looking. But it was absolutely great. It is heavy wood . It was easy to assemble. My granddaughter loves it. Color was just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: We were disappointed when we got to the footboard as the holes were so misaligned they were unusable. However, excellent customer service and they resolved the issue promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Laurelin Janda-Backman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bed! It was easy to put together and its very sturdy! I would really recommend this bed to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves his bed, this bed was easy to assemble by women, I tried to tell my husband what to do and he said go do something else. When I came back to the room my husband and step son was struggling then my daughter came in and put it together in 15 minutes, talking about a mother being impressed. my husband then said that what I told my son to do and he didn’t listen.
customer_reviews.author: CHEVZ

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for an 11 year old and she absolutely loves it. Came a few days later than it was supposed to but it’s perfect. It came with all the pieces and hardware. Put it together myself without dads help in maybe 30 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Darker than expected. Paid $29.00 for delivery, and it took a whole month to arrive from order to delivery. That was 2 weeks later than estimate at time of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Mighty Pleased
customer_reviews.text: It is solid, attractive, and was easy to put together. The mattress fits down a inch or so into the frame. This keeps the mattress in place, but makes changing the sheets a bit of a hassle - though the mattress isn't that heavy to lift out of the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Not a twin bed this company has a fake business address no customer service phone number and the sizes for the frames are not cut correctly. residue left on headboard from epoxy low quality. In addition they do not refund and will fight you for 28 days to close the A-Z case needed to get your money back. Shipping extremely slow.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisz

customer_reviews.title: Works for small child
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. Works for my 4 year old but it's a little flimsy. Not sure if will hold up for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Branda

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Came on time with out damage and was exactly as described. It is a beautiful bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very steady
customer_reviews.text: I like this bed very muchIt Easy to assemble and very steady.
customer_reviews.author: Zhou Wei Ni

customer_reviews.title: Love this sleigh bed!
customer_reviews.text: Easy one person assembly. Good value. Sturdy. Low profile, which makes getting into and out of bed easy for shorties like me. :) My only complaint is I received an oak finish instead of the walnut I selected.
customer_reviews.author: TMad

customer_reviews.title: Great child's bed
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's a great little bed for a child. Its not too high. It is sturdy so far, great color. Easy to put together, took less than 30 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Lucresha Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Fits my daughters’ room perfectly looks great and durable for her.
customer_reviews.author: shonya spellman

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t the easiest to put together, but well worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Pringle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bed for my mom.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble and the perfect size for my mom's room in her nursing home.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hartert

10.4 inches underneath clearance,you can easily vacuum under the bed frame or put your storage bins,space saving and easy organization.
